data.title: The Hornets honored Bobcats legend Gerald Wallace at halftime tonight. Nicknamed "Crash," for his style of play, Wallace is still the only...
data.meta_description:
216 likes, 5 comments - clturenc on February 10, 2024: "The Hornets honored Bobcats legend Gerald Wallace at halftime tonight. Nicknamed "Crash," for his style of play, Wallace is still the only player in Charlotte franchise history to be selected as an NBA All-Star and NBA All-Defensive First Team in the same season (2010).

Former Bobcats Brevin Knight, Matt Carroll, Jeff McInnis, and Derrick Brown also joined Gerald Wallace for the halftime ceremony. 

Gerald Wallace's franchise rankings: 

1st in defensive rebounds 
2nd in steals 
3rd in points 
3rd in total rebounds 
4th in points 

#GeraldWallace #Bobcats #LetsFly35".
